alert.note: Alert for Butte (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:52PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Butte County through 530 PM MDT... At 451 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Owl Butte, or 25 miles northeast of Sturgis, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newell and Owl Butte. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
